org.spf4j.io

Class PipedOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.spf4j.io.PipedOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
 @CleanupObligation
public final class PipedOutputStream
extends OutputStream
    Equivalent to Java piped input/output stream. This implementation supports timeouts, timeout are specified by setting the org.spf4j.base.runtime.DEADLINE thread local. Implementation supports multiple readers and writers. Data is available to readers only after it is flushed. (happens automatically when buffer is full) This implementation should be slightly faster than the JDK implementation.
    Author:
    zoly
